synopsis.text:
Sinbad's Legend of the Seven Seas comes to life as Doraemon and Nobita embark on an extraordinary journey using magical shoes that transport them into the realms of their favorite books. When Shizuka borrows the shoes to explore her own literary adventure, she finds herself lost in the enchanting world of "One Thousand and One Nights."

In a twist of fate, Nobita's mother accidentally burns all of his books, leaving the friends without a direct path to rescue Shizuka. Determined to save her, Doraemon, Nobita, Jyaian, and Suneo must band together and travel back in time to ancient Arabia.

As they navigate the mystical Middle Eastern landscape, the friends face challenges and obstacles in their quest to find Shizuka. Will their combined efforts and unwavering resolve be enough to bring her back to their world? Join Doraemon and the gang on this thrilling adventure to discover the answer!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
